headline: In Annual Letter, M&T Bank Chairman and CEO René Jones Reflects on the Enduring Fundamentals that Sustain Long-Term Performance
summary: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) Chairman and CEO René Jones has released his annual letter to shareholders, continuing a longstanding tradition of reflecting on the bank's performance and sharing insights about the state of the company, the economic conditions impacting its communities, and the broader banking industry.
